documentId: Understanding Arguments_ An Introduction to Informal Logic (1)
content:
en I accepted the challenge to debate Dr. Craig, that we had agreed to debate
only the existence of the Christian God. This limitation was central to my argumentative
strategy here, which relies on the tension between the perfections Christian philosophers and
theologians typically ascribe to God and the beliefs they might form about him as a conse-
quence of accepting the Christian scriptures as revealed truth.
